bookTitle: Love in the Time of Cholera
Plot: In their youth, Florentino Ariza and Fermina Daza fall passionately in love. When Fermina eventually chooses to marry a wealthy, well-born doctor, Florentino is heartbroken, but he is a romantic. As he rises in his business career he whiles away the years in 622 affairs—yet he reserves his heart for Fermina. Her husband dies at last, and Florentino purposefully attends the funeral. Fifty years, nine months, and four days after he first declared his love for Fermina, he will do so again.
Characters: Fermina Daza, Florentino Ariza, Juvenal Urbino, Lorenzo Daza, Aunt Escolástica, Hildebranda Sánchez, Trànsito Ariza, Leona Cassiani, América Vicuna
